snippet: New regulations are intended to make it easier for retirees to transfer money from their 401(k)s into an annuity that would guarantee payments until they die.
abstract: Treasury Department issues new regulations intended to make it easier, and maybe less costly, for middle-class retirees to transfer money from their 401(k) account into an annuity that would guarantee payments until they die.
lead_paragraph: New regulations are intended to make it easier for retirees to transfer money from their 401(k)s into an annuity that would guarantee payments until they die.

headline.seo: New Treasury Rules Ease Purchase of Annuity With 401(k)
